description: AI-generated beats, basslines, melodies, and VST synthesizer presets.
title: Beat Shaper - Generative AI for Musicians
introduction: Beat Shaper applies state-of-the-art generative AI algorithms to music to help artists be more creative. Use Beat Shaper to generate song ideas and samples to break through writer's block and stay in the flow.
features: Trained on a full spectrum of underground electronic music
Control via text prompts or sliders
Full rights to use generative output
targetPeople: Artists, especially those in the underground electronic music scene
